name: After Jazz
description:
After evil wizard disappeared inside down entrance, you decided to follow him. And this was your mistake. Entrance was cursed. Your inventory changed, you had teleported to unknown location. Lucky, you had teleported here not alone, one curious rat jumped in too...

----------------

welcome to the  AFTER JAZZ.

now, in 2023, I had started to develop sequel to the Jazz Pixel Dungeon. A lot of work awaits, but I have prototype of the game. You can try it and offer your suggestions if you wish.

Original Jazz can be found here: https://mindaugasrumsa.itch.io/jazz-dungeon

Original prototype:  https://github.com/jmrapp1/TerraLegion
